purpose.heading: Why Civic Forum?
purpose.description: Civic Forum is a free, open platform built to give every Indian citizen a voice. Here you can raise civic issues in your city or state, discuss solutions with fellow citizens, and hold conversations that matter — from potholes to policy. No political agenda, no noise — just people talking about the issues that affect their daily lives.
